channel.title: XML files?
channel.description: Hello I just changed some configurations in my XML files. All i did was change the npc examine text. Although when I compile and run the changes dont apply. Why?

item.title: XML files?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Sessy Pk3r, post:4, topic:527994”][quote author=Docent link=topic=646742.msg4349544#msg4349544 date=1376426915]
when I compile and run the changes dont apply.
[/quote]

[quote author=Docent link=topic=646742.msg4349549#msg4349549 date=1376427119]
It’s an Xml file. I dont think you need to compile it. It is only a data file.
[/quote] :palm:

/endThread

Did you bother to override when you saved?
Also try restarting your client. :)[/quote]

Well I knew previously that compiling wouldn’t do anything lol. I just tried for the heck of it. Turns out I actually need to create a .bin file. the Lord Satan knows how I can do that.

Read full topic

item.title: XML files?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

are you positive the xml is loaded/parsed? if you’ve modified the file, and it is correctly loaded and parsed - the modified data will be used.

Read full topic

item.title: XML files?
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

Docent:

when I compile and run the changes dont apply.

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:527994”]It’s an Xml file. I dont think you need to compile it. It is only a data file.[/quote] :palm:

/endThread

Did you bother to override when you saved?
Also try restarting your client.

Read full topic

item.title: XML files?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

It’s an Xml file. I dont think you need to compile it. It is only a data file. Just like you cant compile player saves.

Read full topic

item.title: XML files?
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

The compiler probably doesn’t check that file/folder.
